text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Well, it is now 15:00. We have finished experiencing three people's daily lives… But the more we learnt, the more we understood they're all quite different, huh?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Now, I planned to start narrowing it down to a single element for the motif, but… it seems a little difficult to define.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I have one method I'd like to try. Please come to the dorm kitchen after 5th period tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: This is the appointed time. — I see a "Vegetable Cake", "Donut" and "Mille-feuille". What's this?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: These sweets were created based on the images I formed from experiencing the lives of Bakushin O, Jordan, and Flower.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: My parents sometimes used this method to organize their thoughts and develop new works, so I copied them.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I hope to find elements that should be incorporated into the motif from visual information, not just from memory.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I see. Order accepted. Could you please explain in detail?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: The one on the left is inspired by Bakushin O. I took a hint from her exemplary attitude to create a healthy vegetable cake.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: In the center is an iced donut inpired by Jordan. I made it with her nails and lively school life as motif.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: And on the right is a Mille-feuille, inspired by Flower's kindness. I based its colors on those of the flowers in the flower bed.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: … End of scan. Variety is the sugar of life, as they say. "Exemplary", "nails", "flowers", "liveliness", "kindness" — hmm.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, I think I'll need about an hour to analyse and find commonalities. Can you give me that time?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Of course.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: But… Baking is trial and error. I understand that, but we're not making much progress, are we?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: The contest is only 8 days, 19 hours and 55 minutes away. I'm hoping to at least decide on a motif by… the end of today—

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: —Oh dear, it's 14:56. I have to head to training. We'll come back to the motif later.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: See you later then, after training.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wonderful! The weather's all clear and I'm feeling ready to bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … That's—

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Ms. Bakushin O's figure spotted at the gate. I surmise they are preparing to run together.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: One, two, three… Phew…

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: — Ahh! My miss, today's hill training!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Flower and Jordan are here as well…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …? Light state of "shock" identified. What's the matter?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … Oh, nothing. It's training time, so it's only natural.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: We've been living such disparate lives, but when the time comes, we're all here training togeth—
(BANG)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin, Bakushin, Bakushiiiin!!

text_block_list.name: Bakushin O's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's great! Great start, Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Bakushin O's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: But I heard they're doing a 3000m race. She's a sprinter but she never shies away from a challenge, does she?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … huh?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ba… Bakshiin!!

text_block_list.name: Bakushin O's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Aaah, she almost made it but ran out of fuel huh. Nice try, Pres～!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Baku… Baku… Ba… Shiin…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Zee, haa, zee, haaa～. Aughh, I couldn't wiin…! Disappointing!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: However! I'm not going to dwell on it! Because I'm a model student!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In order to set an example for everyone, I must win next time! Bakushin bakushin, ba-ku-shiin!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Bakushin O…

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Taaaaahhh!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa… Aagh, yikes, this is bad.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: — But I'm not done yet! Come on, one more!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Today's menu is… a start dash, sprint drills, and a tempo run to check my form… right?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Okay! Let's do this!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … Ah…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …? Ms. Flash?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … "Determined to win".

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: "Determined to win"?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: T- that's it…! They're "determined to win". The students of this school are "determined to win"… Invariably… Everyone wants to—

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … Sorry, I forgot to explain. I'm talking about the commonalities between all students enrolled at Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Bakushin O always tries to be a role model at school. And the same goes for races. That's why she's "determined to win" the race.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Jordan is always concerned about the condition of her nails. It is not only for fashion… but also for winning.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: "My nails are key to victory. …Where are the care products?"

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Flower is a horsegirl who likes to make people happy. I could see that from the condition of the flower beds. And that's no different when racing.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: "I want to become stronger so I can make everyone happier!"

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Although they live differing lives, at their core they are all "determined to win" and it leaks into their daily lives.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: That's what Tracen Academy is all about…!
